titleStmt.title: A sermon made: by the famous doctor Erasmus of Roterodame
Liturgia Virginis Lauretanae. English
titleStmt.author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by me Robert wyer, dwellynge at the sygne of saynt Iohn̄ euangelyste, in saynt Martyns parysshe, besyde Charynge crosse, in the bysshop of Norwytche rentes,

notesStmt.note: Publisher's name from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Running title reads: A sermon made by Erasmus.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
